channel.title: Preston on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in Preston on News Lancashire

item.title: A big thank you to local #Preston organisations who deal with victims of Violence Against Women & Girls (VAWG), for comi...
item.description: A big thank you to local #Preston organisations who deal with victims of Violence Against Women & Girls (VAWG), for coming down to attend my Westminster Hall debate on ‘Tackling digital exploitation of women and girls.’ Watch from 16:30: bit.ly/VAWGAdjdebat… Read at: bit.

item.title: Had an excellent roundtable discussion with senior figures from Health Authorities that cover #Preston, to discuss issue...
item.description: Had an excellent roundtable discussion with senior figures from Health Authorities that cover #Preston, to discuss issues around victims of Domestic Violence. If you are a victim of domestic violence: Women: 0808 2000 247 www.nationaldahelpline.org.uk Men: 0808 801 0327 mensadviceline.org.uk

item.title: Happy Lancashire Day to all my fellow #Prestonians. Celebrate #ProudPreston and our unique cultural heritage in the be...
item.description: Happy Lancashire Day to all my fellow #Prestonians. Celebrate #ProudPreston and our unique cultural heritage in the beautiful Red Rose County, by supporting local businesses, visiting and exploring places in lovely Lancashire. #LancashireDay #Preston. Source: Mark Hendrick MP (Bluesky)

item.title: I would like to wish all my #Preston constituents, friends, family and colleagues a very Happy New Year and all the best...
item.description: I would like to wish all my #Preston constituents, friends, family and colleagues a very Happy New Year and all the best for 2026. Source: Mark Hendrick MP (Bluesky)

item.title: I’m pleased to announce that I will be leading a Westminster Hall debate on ‘Tackling digital exploitation of women and...
item.description: I’m pleased to announce that I will be leading a Westminster Hall debate on ‘Tackling digital exploitation of women and girls’ on Tuesday 27 January. Watch the debate live on Tuesday 27th January at 4.30pm at: www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons Source: Mark Hendrick MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Labour is putting money back into #Preston with a £10.1m boost for local services and an extra £310 million for Lancashi...
item.description: Labour is putting money back into #Preston with a £10.1m boost for local services and an extra £310 million for Lancashire over the next five years. This is a huge 38% increase for Preston City Council and 27% increase for Lancashire County Council, one of the largest settlements in the country.

item.title: Last week, the Government announced its VAWG Strategy. I am pleased that many of my recommendations have been fully impl...
item.description: Last week, the Government announced its VAWG Strategy. I am pleased that many of my recommendations have been fully implemented in this Strategy. Minister’s statement here: www.gov.uk/government/s… Source: Mark Hendrick MP (Bluesky)

item.title: This year’s Holocaust Memorial Day theme is ‘Bridging Generations’, highlighting the importance of survivors and their f...
item.description: This year’s Holocaust Memorial Day theme is ‘Bridging Generations’, highlighting the importance of survivors and their families passing on memory and understanding to this and future generations. Watch the first-hand account of Paul Sved BEM: www.het.org.uk/education/ou… Source: Mark Hendrick MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Well done and thank you to all the schools, community and youth groups in #Preston that took part in UK Parliament Week...
item.description: Well done and thank you to all the schools, community and youth groups in #Preston that took part in UK Parliament Week last week. A huge 48 activities took place throughout Preston, with children and young people finding out about how Parliament works and how it affects everyone’s daily lives.

item.title: Wishing all my friends, colleagues & #Preston constituents a very Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! I hope you have a...
item.description: Wishing all my friends, colleagues & #Preston constituents a very Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! I hope you have a wonderful time with your loved ones this festive season. Source: Mark Hendrick MP (Bluesky)

item.title: 'It stands as a tribute to my father’s values' - Zuber Issa on inspiration behind Blackburn's new £5m mosque
item.description: Blackburn’s newest mosque is a tribute to the father of the town’s Issa brothers, it has been revealed. Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: Review: Audi e-tron GT
item.description: New e-tron GT deploys Audi’s performance EV polish, says Tom Sharpe Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: 'Are we going to make it back?' - Burnley Netflix star Dave Fishwick on his near-death experience
item.description: Burnley business magnate Dave Fishwick has revealed the moment he came terrifyingly close to death. Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: Review: Peugeot e-3008
item.description: Julie Marshall finds Peugeot’s e-3008 looks more like a sporty coupe than a family SUV Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: Iconic menswear brand returns to original Southport home
item.description: The popular shop first opened over 40 years aog. Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: 'Positive stuff', 'Question marks' - How the Preston North End faithful rated club's transfer window
item.description: PNE signed three new players in the transfer window Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Council leader to give keynote lecture on future of local government amid Lancashire shake-up
item.description: The leader of Preston City Council will set out his vision for the future of local government at a special event to be held at Lancaster University next week. Source: Blackpool Gazette

item.title: Preston leader to give keynote lecture on future of local government amid Lancashire shake-up
item.description: The leader of Preston City Council will set out his vision for the future of local government at a special event to be held at Lancaster University next week. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Plea for Preston bus lane fines to stay in city
item.description: Lancashire County Council says it invests proceeds from fines in maintaining and upgrading highways. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Preston shop owner fined after knife sold to child in test purchase sting
item.description: A Preston shop owner has been fined after a knife was illegally sold to a 14-year-old during a trading standards test purchase operation. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Preston North End predicted XI vs Portsmouth as Callum Lang in contention to face old club
item.description: A return to Deepdale this weekend for the Lilywhites Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Major rethink for Preston apartments plan - six years on
item.description: Longstanding plans for a new apartment block in Preston city centre have been ripped up and redesigned after a larger plot of land became available to build it on. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: 30 nostalgic pictures from 1969 and 1970 in Preston which remind us of long gone days
item.description: This is the picture collection takes us back to 1969 and 1970. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Preston North End and Hull City fined for fracas
item.description: Preston North End and Hull City are fined by the FA for improper conduct after a melee in the aftermath of Milutin Osmajic’s sending off last month. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Paul Heckingbottom: Portsmouth and Brighton deals, Armstrong blow and Preston North End's transfer window
item.description: PNE signed three players in the January transfer window and saw four leave Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Preston North End boss highlights importance of £1.3m sale despite losing 'good character and personality'
item.description: Frokjaer made 107 appearances for the Lilywhites after joining in the summer of 2023 Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Preston sweet shop's golden ticket prize draw includes free flights to South Asia
item.description: Preston shoppers could soon be packing their bags after a popular high street sweet shop launched a nationwide giveaway offering return flights abroad, free sweets for life and discounts for an entire year. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Preston restaurant Aven climbs the UK Top 100
item.description: Preston’s food scene is celebrating another big moment, as Aven Restaurant has once again been named among the UK’s Top 100 restaurants by SquareMeal. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: I tour Preston’s most impressive homes on the market, a vast riverside property built for modern family living
item.description: A substantial and exceptionally versatile 4-bed detached family home on Ashworth Grove, Preston, offering generous living space is up for sale. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: 'On him now' - Paul Heckingbottom issues Milutin Osmajic stance as Preston North End man to return from ban
item.description: PNE striker will return from his ban after Saturday’s game against Portsmouth Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Lancashire Police take action against driver who hit boy, 14, at Preston car meet
item.description: A 14-year-old boy who suffered a fractured skull when he was hit by a vehicle at a car meet in Preston has been discharged from hospital. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Portsmouth boss offers honest Callum Lang fitness verdict after Preston North End switch
item.description: Preston North End completed the signing of Callum Lang for a club-record fee from Portsmouth on deadline day. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Royal Preston Hospital blue badge car park to close for 16 days for resurfacing and repairs
item.description: Visitors to Royal Preston Hospital are being warned the blue badge car park will be closed for more than two weeks from tomorrow (Friday, February 6). Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Lancashire Police concerned for welfare of missing Preston man Ajani Campbell
item.description: Police are concerned for the welfare of a missing man from Preston. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: ‘It was really clear’: Honest Portsmouth boss lifts lid on Callum Lang’s Preston North End club-record switch
item.description: Preston North End sealed the signing of Callum Lang from Portsmouth on deadline day. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: "It's pretty special"- Preston's fine dining restaurant Aven named in SquareMeal’s Top 100
item.description: Preston’s food scene is celebrating another big moment, as Aven Restaurant has once again been named among the UK’s Top 100 restaurants by SquareMeal. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: SpudBros make statement on Halal food - and announce Ramadan event in Preston
item.description: Preston’s potato sensations SpudBros have addressed questions over their stance on Halal food. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Major demolitions, new shops & new apartments: all the plans submitted in Preston recently
item.description: Take a look below at all planning applications submitted to Preston City Council over the past two weeks. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: 'Good investment' - Stoke City and Blackburn Rovers verdicts on Preston North End's new £1m signing
item.description: The Irishman was one of two deadline day signings at Deepdale Source: LEP Preston

item.title: 'It's deadline day today!' - Your last chance to nominate your community heroes for Proud Preston Awards 2026
item.description: The clock is ticking as the deadline to nominate your favourite community heroes in Preston closes today. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: 'This is the one thing we think should happen to Preston bus gate fines', city businesses say
item.description: Business leaders have called for the cash raised from ‘bus gate’ fines issued in Preston to stay in the city – and be spent on improving its roads. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Preston apartment block plan kicked out by council
item.description: A bid to build a new three-storey apartment block near Preston city centre has been rejected. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: 'We're not making any money': Preston Bus defends 50p fare hike in the city
item.description: Preston Bus has defended a recent rise in its fares, claiming that it has been left more than £100,000 a year out of pocket by central and local government funding for two price-reduction schemes for passengers. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Man on push bike exposes himself to lone woman on Preston footpath
item.description: A man on a push bike reportedly exposed himself to a lone woman on a footpath in Preston. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: 43 fascinating images of Preston in 1954 taking you back more than 70 years to a very different city
item.description: 1954 Preston was a very different city indeed. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: I tour Ashton‑On‑Ribble’s spacious family home, a 4-bed detached house with open-plan living for sale
item.description: A striking four‑bedroom detached family home in the sought‑after Ashton‑On‑Ribble area of Preston, offering generous living space, modern open‑plan design and excellent outdoor amenities. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Lancaster lecture will provide glimpse into future of region
item.description: As part of an exploration of the different ways of connecting with the north-west region – responding to the debate around English Devolution – Lancaster University has organised a lecture to be given by the Leader of Preston City Council.

item.title: 'Blow to lose Armstrong, but good signings made'
item.description: BBC Radio Lancashire’s Andy Bayes analyses Preston North End’s January transfer business. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Frustrated dad violently shook baby son, jury told
item.description: Peter Sayle, 31, denies murdering his six-week-old son Huxley in Preston in June 2022. Source: BBC Lancashire
